caller_intent: Curtis Williams is inquiring whether his insurance policy covers towing services after his car was towed on Wednesday and seeks assistance with filing a claim.
resolution_steps: Agent requested Curtis's policy-associated phone numbers (home and mobile) to update contact information.
Agent confirmed Curtis's current numbers and clarified that an old number is no longer valid.
Agent explained the process of sending a text message to Curtis's mobile number to request a tow receipt for claim filing.
Curtis agreed to provide the receipt via text, and the agent committed to processing it once received.
knowledge_required: Understanding insurance coverage for towing services
summary: Curtis Williams contacted Alliance Insurance to confirm if his policy covers towing after his car was towed. The agent updated his contact information and arranged to receive a tow receipt via text for claim processing. The call concluded with the agent agreeing to follow up once the receipt is submitted.
